summary: This test module validates the behavior of Lightning's model compilation utilities, checking that models can be compiled and uncompiled correctly, that the Trainer works with compiled models, and that logging and other Trainer features remain functional under compiled execution.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability of the compile/uncompile workflow in the Lightning framework, confirming compatibility with different PyTorch versions, CUDA availability, and Trainer operations to prevent regressions in model deployment pipelines.
